RegisterScreen.privacyText: We value your privacy. We will only use your address information as the return address for the mailed letter.

SupportFAQScreen.cancelMyLetter: I want to delete my letter
SupportFAQScreen.notYetArrived: I sent my letter more than 6 days ago and it hasn't arrived at the facility yet
SupportFAQScreen.wrongMailingAddress: I put the wrong mailing address
SupportFAQScreen.wrongReturnAddress: I put the wrong return address

SupportFAQDetailScreen.cancelMyLetter1: Sorry to hear that. Unfortunately, we cannot cancel letters after they are sent
SupportFAQDetailScreen.cancelMyLetter2: Letters are immediately sent to our printers after you submit and they are already on their way.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.notYetArrived: Due to COVID-19, USPS is experiencing temporary delays in delivery. We’ll report your problem to the service provider and we appreciate your patience during this time. We are trying our best to ensure the letter gets to your recipient soon.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.wrongMailingAddress: Sorry to hear that! We won’t be able to edit the address for this letter since it’s already on the way, but you can easily update your loved one’s address to make sure they get the next ones!
SupportFAQDetailScreen.wrongReturnAddress: We’re sorry to hear that! To update your return address, you can update your profile here.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.trackingNumber: Each letter sent through our platform has a unique barcode that gets scanned by USPS as it travels through the mail stream. However, we do not have access to the specific USPS tracking number at this time.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.trackingError: We’re sorry to hear that! Please reach out to us so we can help you figure out what went wrong.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.talkToAmeelio: We’re happy to talk and we’d be more than glad to help however we can!
